DOC.brief_summary: An open-label , single-sequence study evaluate effect azithromycin BCT197 exposure healthy male subject .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Azithromycin BCT197 Exposure Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This open study conduct healthy male subject single centre . Each subject participate screen visit 2 study period . At first study period , subject receive single dose BCT197 study period 2 , subject receive 3 daily dos azithromycin single dose BCT197 .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Healthy male subject . Nonsmokers ( include ecigarettes ) . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 18 ≤ 30 kg/m2 . Willing use highly effective barrier contraception method . Male subject must donate sperm study . Exclusion Criteria Any subject preexist active skin disease . Laboratory value screen deem clinically significant . Volunteers abnormal liver function test . 12 Lead ECG QTcF > 450 msec . Allergy BCT197 excipients . Known hypersensitivity intolerance azithromycin . Taking medication know cause QTc prolongation . Positive human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B hepatitis C. Any clinically significant illness within 30 day prior study drug administration . Volunteers , opinion Investigator , unsuitable participation study .
